The Tashidian Mining Area No.1 Well Coal Mine is an underground coal mine with a designed production capacity of 1.2 million tons per year

web_search_companies.notes: Xinjiang Xingmei Mining Company operates the mine, which is owned by Jizhong Energy Group.
